text: idu avana (allahana) puravegalallondu; bhumiyu tira onagiruvudannu nivu kanuttiri. Adare, navu adara mele nirannu ilisidaga adu nalanalisatodaguttade hagu arali biduttade. Khanditavagiyu adannu jivantagolisidavane, sattavarannu jivantagolisuvanu. Avanu khandita ellavannu mada ballavanagiddane
